unnormalised: The formal communication channels of government bodies often require precise adherence to address formats. Understanding the proper structuring of government and institutional addresses within India is crucial for effective correspondence. Inaccurate or incomplete addresses can lead to delays in processing important documents. The standard format typically includes the name of the department or institution, followed by the building name or number, street name, locality, city, state, and postal code.
